summary.value: Hidden beneath this canopy, you’ll find not gentleness, nor brutality, but a whole universe.

data.haunt: Creatures that you have attacked or targeted with a spell this round suffer a penalty equal to 【the number of Primal Sanctuaries you have Bonded】 to their Accuracy or Magic Checks that include the Hauntee among their targets.
data.ritual: Reveal the hidden lives and relationships of beasts.
